title: World Champion Picks Predictions

replies.body: Eve is S tier, did we time travel to season 4?
The ultimate changes helped her a lot. We saw her being played in the scrim leaks between SKT and TSM.

Top: Upgrade shen to S, remove jayce from the list completely.

Jungle: Evelynn won't make it at world, too easy to counter.Graves to A, Rek and Grag to S like they have always been.

Mid: Jayce removed.Don't know why you love him so much hahaha.Rest seems pretty legit.

ADC:Lucian down to A, Ashe probably up to S and caitlyn not in it.Could add Tristana to A though depending on the team comp they are running.

Support: Seems pretty legit, i doubt we'll see thresh and nami though.Maybe once or twice but probably not more than that.

While I disagree with his list, there's a few things you're missing
1. Shen wont see play, I would bet my right nut on this.
2. Rek stays in A, Grag can move back up.
3. Graves stays at S
4. I don't know why he has Jayce up their either, lol.
5. Ashe stays in A
6. Trist???? How about no.
7. Thresh and Nami will see play,.

1.Just for the global pressure i'm pretty sure we'll see him.
2.Same as number 1.Never forget that global pressure is one of the most important thing in professional play.
3.Might be, i haven't seen him in a while so i can give you this one :P
4.exactly hahahaha
5.If she was nerfed lately yes.If not she is clearly an S.
6.Like i said, this one depends on the team and the situation.For some team it might be an A pick, while for some it's like a F one.
7.Yeah i could see them being played, but not as much as other S or even A champ.They are ok, but they depend a lot on your team comp.

>Top: Upgrade shen to S, remove jayce from the list completely.

I don't think that with the 6.18 nerfs that shen will be S tier along with the likes of Ekko and Gnar. I think that Jayce goes really well into Gnar/Shen/GP which makes him really good. 

>Jungle: Evelynn won't make it at world, too easy to counter.Graves to A, Rek and Grag to S like they have always been.

We saw Eve in the SKT vs TSM scrim leaks, the ultimate changes and the lane swap changes helped her a lot. The nerfs to Rek and Gragas hurt them a lot, Rek'sai is going to have a harder time keeping up with everyone. Gragas is much easier to react to with the cask changes. Graves does well into Elise who I believe will be the top jungler at worlds which is why I think he will do well.

>Mid: Jayce removed.Don't know why you love him so much hahaha.Rest seems pretty legit.
I moved him down to A I still think he is a legit pick, but probably not on Vlad tier.

>ADC:Lucian down to A, Ashe probably up to S and caitlyn not in it.Could add Tristana to A though depending on the team comp they are running.

The Ashe nerfs are actually pretty big imo. Lucian will be a strong pick into Sivir. Trist, MF and Twitch are all breaking on A tier and its tempting to put them there, but I don't think they will make the cut. I think they will see a few games though. 

>Support: Seems pretty legit, i doubt we'll see thresh and nami though.Maybe once or twice but probably not more than that.

If I could make a B++ tier, Thresh would be on it.

Even with nerfs, shen just have so much global presence and everything that he must be S tier.For jayce i don't know if you saw him in scrims or anything (that will go for eve too) but scrims are scrims.Splyce played sion support very often in scrims during regular season and ended up playing him only in the last game since victory or defeat had no impact on current standings.

For Adc i'll trust you, i haven't been following the nerfs and buffs much.

What? Jayce S tier? Since when? O.o
He still rush tear 1st item?

I dont really think Zilean and Jayce are S tier. Zilean seems like more of a counterpick and I dont think i've seen a Jayce all year. but then again i have only been watching C9 games and random EU games while i waited for C9 to start so its safe to say i might have just missed Jayce. Kassadin has been pretty pick/ban over in the EU games i watched so maybe he could show up

Considering how much Gangplank we've seen in the "First Brick" meta already, 
I'd put him at S-tier pick/ban too.
What about Sivir for ad carries?

Sivir probably  still S tier.  

Mid's missing Syndra in this list who is at least A, maybe higher.
yeah there are some picks that I forgot, Sivir and Syndra being two of them.
WOAH A RIOTER REPLIED TO ME!!!

What, no {{champion:154}}? He's absolutely able to hang with the rest of the second-tier junglers.

Kinda surprised {{champion:41}} isn't here either, he hasn't stopped being a contender since he got those damned barrels.

{{champion:27}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:75}} 
Just some wild picks but I do see a possibility

Champs that will deceide the Campionship: {{champion:34}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:67}} 
i don´t think a team that doesn´t have them in their pocket will make it to the finals.
